plot: Two young Japanese schoolboys, one skinny and poor, one fat and well-to-do, become unlikely friends.
title: Chibideka monogatari
plot_es: Two young Japanese schoolboys, one skinny and poor, one fat and well-to-do, become unlikely friends.
plot_en: Two young Japanese schoolboys, one skinny and poor, one fat and well-to-do, become unlikely friends.
